title: Disc, one of a pair
description: Disc, one of a pair, spinach green jade, carved on both sides with designs of birds and flowers. Discs of this type, probably inspired by the ancient PI discs, were used for altar or table decorations.  Alternate title Circular Table Screen with Stand  Stand for this piece is in A10.8 MS; Labelled 34.21.3b  Pair is 34.21.3
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
